name: Akoya-Pattern Starship Engines
desc: Special Engines developed by Akoya Interstellar Industries that Increase the durability of the ship's engines by %s, and the ship's hull integrity by %s. The ship's sensor profile is also reduced by %s.
short: Makes engines harder to disable, lowers sensor profile.

name: Degraded Akoya-Pattern Starship Engines
desc: Special Engines developed by Akoya Interstellar Industries that Increase the durability of the ship's engines by %s and the ship's sensor profile is also reduced by %s. However as these particular engines have been poorly maintained, their effects have somewhat degraded
short: Makes engines harder to disable, lowers sensor profile.
